column4: hi, when i put an sd card into computer, it cant find it and i cant do anything with it. Would that be a driver problem or something else?
depends. :) with some laptops the built in card readers are not supported. Plug it in. check dmesg output. see where its being acttatched to. then try to mouint it manually.
what is a dmesg output? SOrry i am new to the game here
the command 'dmesg' shows all sorts of kernel/messages
